casebody.data:
GEORGE W. WELD, et al., Respondents, v. BERNARD REILLY, Sheriff, &c., Appellant.

Before Sedgwick, Ch. J., and Speir and Freedman, JJ.

Decided December 6, 1880. Appeal from judgment and order denying motion for new trial on the minutes. Vanderpoel, Green & Cuming, attorneys, and John Yard and Almon Goodwin, of counsel, for appellant. Stickney & Shepard, for respondents. Speir, J.,

wrote for reversal of judgment and order, with costs ; Sedgwick, Ch. J., concurred in result.
